parameters.name: inventoryFactory
parameters.doc: A factory that creates new item handler for an item stack. The runnable given to that function should be called in onContentsChanged

doc.summary: Creates a new item with inventory.
doc.text: Creates a new item with inventory.

doc.summary: Gets the inventory of an <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref> or null if the ItemStack doesn't have the item handler capability  or the item handler is not an instance of <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/items/IItemHandlerModifiable">IItemHandlerModifiable</ref>.
doc.text: Gets the inventory of an <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref> or null if the ItemStack doesn't have the item handler capability  or the item handler is not an instance of <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/items/IItemHandlerModifiable">IItemHandlerModifiable</ref>.

doc.summary: Gets an <ref cls="java/util/Optional">Optional</ref> containing the inventory of an <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref> or an empty optional if the ItemStack  doesn't have the item handler capability or the item handler is not an instance of <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/items/IItemHandlerModifiable">IItemHandlerModifiable</ref>.
doc.text: Gets an <ref cls="java/util/Optional">Optional</ref> containing the inventory of an <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">ItemStack</ref> or an empty optional if the ItemStack  doesn't have the item handler capability or the item handler is not an instance of <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/items/IItemHandlerModifiable">IItemHandlerModifiable</ref>.

doc.summary: Base class for <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/Item">items</ref> which have an inventory.
doc.text: Base class for <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/Item">items</ref> which have an inventory. This will provide the capability to the item.
